extensionName.description: Name of the extension. Do NOT translate, keep the name in English.

extensionDescription.message: Tõlgi saite oma brauseris, ilma pilve kasutamata.

loadingTranslationEngine.description: Tells the user the translation engine is being loaded.

translationLoadedWithErrors.message: Automaattõlge on lubatud, kuid leidsime vigu.
translationLoadedWithErrors.description: Tells the user the translation engine was loaded but errors were found.

checksumErrorsDownloadingEngine.description: Tells the user there were errors downloading the translation engine.

notfoundErrorsDownloadingEngine.description: Tells the user the translation engine could not be found to download.

nodataDownloadingEngine.message: Tõlkemootori allalaadimisel me andmeid ei leidnud.
nodataDownloadingEngine.description: Tells the user the translation engine had not data when downloading.

translationEnabled.description: Tells the user the automatic translation was enabled.

translationEnabledNoOT.message: Automaatne tõlge on lubatud, kuid vormide tõlkimist selles keeles ei toetata.
translationEnabledNoOT.description: Tells the user the automatic translation was enabled but form translations is not supported.

timeoutDownloadingEngine.description: Tells the user the download of the translation engine timed out.

errorLoadingWasm.description: Tells the user we found and error loading the translation engine.

statsMessage.message: Tõlge on lubatud. Sekundis tõlgitud sõnad: $WORDSPERSECOND$.
statsMessage.description: Tells the user that translation is enabled and the current performance metric of words translated per second.

downloadProgress.description: Tells the user the download progress of the engine artifacts.

displayStatisticsMessage.description: Option in menu to show statistics in the infobar (display is intended as a verb).

surveyMessage.description: A message to invite a user to participate in survey. It's displayed on a button so it has to be short!

outboundTranslationsMessage.description: Checkbox to enable the translation of forms.

formtranslationsReady.description: Notifies that the form translation is ready to be used.

formtranslationsTyping.description: Notifies the user that typing is occuring in the form translations area.

formtranslationsTranslationInProgress.description: Notifies the user that the translation of the input text is happening.

formtranslationsTranslationCompleted.description: Notifies the user that the translation of the input text is completed.

formtranslationsDescription.message: See on Firefox Translationsi vormi tõlkimise funktsionaalsus. Sisesta väljale vasakul keeles $navigatorLanguage$ ja tõlge sisestatakse algsesse vormi keeles $pageLanguage$. Väli paremal kuvab kontrollimise eesmärgil tagasi tõlgitud sisu keelest $pageLanguage$ keelde $navigatorLanguage$.
formtranslationsDescription.description: Usage instructions of form translations to be displayed to the user.

languageDefaultOption.description: Default option in the language dropdown.

translateAsBrowseOn.message: Tõlgi selle kaardi sisu lehitsemise ajal automaatselt
translateAsBrowseOn.description: Message displayed to the user (as a button), asking if they want to turn on automatic translation for the tab.

translateAsBrowseOff.message: Lülita selle kaardi sisu automaatne tõlkimine lehitsemise ajal välja
translateAsBrowseOff.description: Message displayed to the user (as a button) to turn off automatic translation in the tab.

translationProgress.description: Number of elements still pending to be translated by the engine.

tlsIncompatibility.message: Firefox Translations töötab ainult turvalistel (HTTPS) lehtedel.
tlsIncompatibility.description: Informs the user that the extension doesn't work on non-https pages.

datacollectionConsentPageTitle.message: Kas lubada lisal Firefox Translations saata tehnilisi ja interaktsiooniandmeid Mozillale?
datacollectionConsentPageTitle.description: Header of the data collection consent page

datacollectionConsentPageDescription.message: See hõlmab kõrgetasemelisi kasutaja interaktsioone ja vearaporteid. Seda sätet saab igal ajal sätete alt muuta. Andmed on salvestatud turvaliselt ja ilma isikut tuvastava teabeta.
datacollectionConsentPageDescription.description: Description of the data collection consent page

datacollectionConsentPageUserInteraction.description: Title for the option that allows Mozilla to collect high level user-interaction

datacollectionConsentPageErrorsOption.description: Title for the option that allows Mozilla to collect error reports

errorHighlightingMessage.description: Checkbox to highlight translation errors in the page in red.

translationBarPageIsIn.description: This message is followed by a dropdown list of language names. If this doesn't work for your locale, you can translate it as ”Language of the page:”

translationBarTranslateButton.description: Label for the button to start the translation

translationBarOptionsButton.description: Label for an Options button that will display a dropdown menu

translationBarNeverThisSiteLabel.description: Label for a checkbox to never translate the current website

translationBarNeverThisSiteAccesskey.description: Accesskey for a checkbox to never translate the current website

optionsMenuLabel.description: Label for options menu item in the Options dropdown

optionsMenuAccesskey.description: Accesskey for options menu item in the Options dropdown

neverForLanguageLabel.description: Label for options menu item in the Options dropdown. Language is replaced by a language name.

neverForLanguageAccesskey.description: Accesskey for options menu item in the Options dropdown.
